# .dotfiles

1. Clone this repository under ~/Downloads
2. Run install.sh
3. Open a new Terminal Window of Bash


### Current Status
>  1. .bash_profile
>  2. .bashrc
>  3. .vimrc
        1. Basic settings 
        2. Theme settings
        2. Plugins
        3. Shortcuts
>  4. .bashrc.d
>       1. bash_aliases
>       2. bash_export
>       3. bash_complete
